title: Linux bzip2 Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the bzip2 compression utility in Linux, learn how to compress and decompress files, and discover advanced bzip2 options and techniques.

meta.description: Explore the bzip2 compression utility in Linux, learn how to compress and decompress files, and discover advanced bzip2 options and techniques.
meta.keywords: bzip2, compression, decompression, Linux, file management, archiving, command line
